name: ENVIRON® ENV39-NC480
description: ENVIRON® alloy is a unique blend of semi-crystalline polyester (polybutylene terephthalate, or polyethylene terephthalate) and polycarbonate. Our ENVIRON® products offer superior chemical resistance, impact strength, cold temperature impact, good flow, toughness and heat resistance. Enviroplas resin has been the material of choice for custom polycarbonates and polycarbonate alloys, and our ENVIRON® alloy and ENVIRON® PBT grades can be formulated to meet your applications needs including flame retardants, custom colors, impact modifiers, and UV packages to meet your weatherability requirements.
